thread.section_title: L'Edmond Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Love this hotel
thread.title_full: Love this hotel - Review of L'Edmond Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Anne M
title: Love this hotel
text: Thanks to all at L'edmond for a great stay in Paris.its our 4th time to stay here because of the comfort and staff and location of L'edmond.its situated in a lovely area with cafes,restaurants &markets near.metro near.park monceau is short walk away.felt very safe in this area.would highly recommend to stay at L'edmond and we hope to return in the near future.
